casebody.data:
State
v.
Greggory G. Mosher, Jr. 242P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2016 Greggory G. Mosher, Sr., for Mosher, Greggory George (Jr.). Teresa M. Postell, Assistant Attorney General, Ernie Lee, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

*780The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of June 2016 by Defendant to Appoint Counsel:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of August 2016."
